037package org.jfree.chart.block;
038
039import java.awt.Graphics2D;
040import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
041import java.io.Serializable;
042import java.util.ArrayList;
043import java.util.List;
044import org.jfree.chart.api.HorizontalAlignment;
045import org.jfree.chart.api.VerticalAlignment;
046
047/**
048 * Arranges blocks in a column layout.  This class is immutable.
049 */
050public class ColumnArrangement implements Arrangement, Serializable {
051
052    /** For serialization. */
053    private static final long serialVersionUID = -5315388482898581555L;
054
055    /** The horizontal alignment of blocks. */
056    private HorizontalAlignment horizontalAlignment;
057
058    /** The vertical alignment of blocks within each row. */
059    private VerticalAlignment verticalAlignment;
060
061    /** The horizontal gap between columns. */
062    private double horizontalGap;
063
064    /** The vertical gap between items in a column. */
065    private double verticalGap;
066
067    /**
068     * Creates a new instance.
069     */
070    public ColumnArrangement() {
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Creates a new instance.
075     *
076     * @param hAlign  the horizontal alignment (currently ignored).
077     * @param vAlign  the vertical alignment (currently ignored).
078     * @param hGap  the horizontal gap.
079     * @param vGap  the vertical gap.
080     */
081    public ColumnArrangement(HorizontalAlignment hAlign,
082                             VerticalAlignment vAlign,
083                             double hGap, double vGap) {
084        this.horizontalAlignment = hAlign;
085        this.verticalAlignment = vAlign;
086        this.horizontalGap = hGap;
087        this.verticalGap = vGap;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Adds a block to be managed by this instance.  This method is usually
092     * called by the {@link BlockContainer}, you shouldn't need to call it
093     * directly.
094     *
095     * @param block  the block.
096     * @param key  a key that controls the position of the block.
097     */
098    @Override
099    public void add(Block block, Object key) {
100        // since the flow layout is relatively straightforward, no information
101        // needs to be recorded here
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Calculates and sets the bounds of all the items in the specified
106     * container, subject to the given constraint.  The {@code Graphics2D}
107     * can be used by some items (particularly items containing text) to
108     * calculate sizing parameters.
109     *
110     * @param container  the container whose items are being arranged.
111     * @param g2  the graphics device.
112     * @param constraint  the size constraint.
113     *
114     * @return The size of the container after arrangement of the contents.
115     */
116    @Override
117    public Size2D arrange(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2,
118                          RectangleConstraint constraint) {
119
120        LengthConstraintType w = constraint.getWidthConstraintType();
121        LengthConstraintType h = constraint.getHeightConstraintType();
122        if (w == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
123            if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
124                return arrangeNN(container, g2);
125            }
126            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
127                throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented.");
128            }
129            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
130                throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented.");
131            }
132        }
133        else if (w == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
134            if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
135                throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented.");
136            }
137            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
138                return arrangeFF(container, g2, constraint);
139            }
140            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
141                throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented.");
142            }
143        }
144        else if (w == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
145            if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
146                throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented.");
147            }
148            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
149                return arrangeRF(container, g2, constraint);
150            }
151            else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
152                return arrangeRR(container, g2, constraint);
153            }
154        }
155        return new Size2D();  // TODO: complete this
156
157    }
158
159    /**
160     * Calculates and sets the bounds of all the items in the specified
161     * container, subject to the given constraint.  The {@code Graphics2D}
162     * can be used by some items (particularly items containing text) to
163     * calculate sizing parameters.
164     *
165     * @param container  the container whose items are being arranged.
166     * @param g2  the graphics device.
167     * @param constraint  the size constraint.
168     *
169     * @return The container size after the arrangement.
170     */
171    protected Size2D arrangeFF(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2,
172                               RectangleConstraint constraint) {
173        // TODO: implement properly
174        return arrangeNF(container, g2, constraint);
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Calculates and sets the bounds of all the items in the specified
179     * container, subject to the given constraint.  The {@code Graphics2D}
180     * can be used by some items (particularly items containing text) to
181     * calculate sizing parameters.
182     *
183     * @param container  the container whose items are being arranged.
184     * @param constraint  the size constraint.
185     * @param g2  the graphics device.
186     *
187     * @return The container size after the arrangement.
188     */
189    protected Size2D arrangeNF(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2,
190                               RectangleConstraint constraint) {
191
192        List<Block> blocks = container.getBlocks();
193
194        double height = constraint.getHeight();
195        if (height <= 0.0) {
196            height = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
197        }
198
199        double x = 0.0;
200        double y = 0.0;
201        double maxWidth = 0.0;
202        List<Block> itemsInColumn = new ArrayList<>();
203        for (Block block : blocks) {
204            Size2D size = block.arrange(g2, RectangleConstraint.NONE);
205            if (y + size.height <= height) {
206                itemsInColumn.add(block);
207                block.setBounds(
208                    new Rectangle2D.Double(x, y, size.width, size.height)
209                );
210                y = y + size.height + this.verticalGap;
211                maxWidth = Math.max(maxWidth, size.width);
212            }
213            else {
214                if (itemsInColumn.isEmpty()) {
215                    // place in this column (truncated) anyway
216                    block.setBounds(
217                        new Rectangle2D.Double(
218                            x, y, size.width, Math.min(size.height, height - y)
219                        )
220                    );
221                    y = 0.0;
222                    x = x + size.width + this.horizontalGap;
223                }
224                else {
225                    // start new column
226                    itemsInColumn.clear();
227                    x = x + maxWidth + this.horizontalGap;
228                    y = 0.0;
229                    maxWidth = size.width;
230                    block.setBounds(
231                        new Rectangle2D.Double(
232                            x, y, size.width, Math.min(size.height, height)
233                        )
234                    );
235                    y = size.height + this.verticalGap;
236                    itemsInColumn.add(block);
237                }
238            }
239        }
240        return new Size2D(x + maxWidth, constraint.getHeight());
241    }
242
243    /**
244     * Arranges a container with range constraints for both the horizontal
245     * and vertical.
246     *
247     * @param container  the container.
248     * @param g2  the graphics device.
249     * @param constraint  the constraint.
250     *
251     * @return The size of the container.
252     */
253    protected Size2D arrangeRR(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2,
254                               RectangleConstraint constraint) {
255
256        // first arrange without constraints, and see if this fits within
257        // the required ranges...
258        Size2D s1 = arrangeNN(container, g2);
259        if (constraint.getHeightRange().contains(s1.height)) {
260            return s1;  // TODO: we didn't check the width yet
261        }
262        else {
263            RectangleConstraint c = constraint.toFixedHeight(
264                constraint.getHeightRange().getUpperBound()
265            );
266            return arrangeRF(container, g2, c);
267        }
268    }
269
270    /**
271     * Arranges the blocks in the container using a fixed height and a
272     * range for the width.
273     *
274     * @param container  the container.
275     * @param g2  the graphics device.
276     * @param constraint  the constraint.
277     *
278     * @return The size of the container after arrangement.
279     */
280    protected Size2D arrangeRF(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2,
281                               RectangleConstraint constraint) {
282
283        Size2D s = arrangeNF(container, g2, constraint);
284        if (constraint.getWidthRange().contains(s.width)) {
285            return s;
286        }
287        else {
288            RectangleConstraint c = constraint.toFixedWidth(
289                constraint.getWidthRange().constrain(s.getWidth())
290            );
291            return arrangeFF(container, g2, c);
292        }
293    }
294
295    /**
296     * Arranges the blocks without any constraints.  This puts all blocks
297     * into a single column.
298     *
299     * @param container  the container.
300     * @param g2  the graphics device.
301     *
302     * @return The size after the arrangement.
303     */
304    protected Size2D arrangeNN(BlockContainer container, Graphics2D g2) {
305        double y = 0.0;
306        double height = 0.0;
307        double maxWidth = 0.0;
308        List<Block> blocks = container.getBlocks();
309        int blockCount = blocks.size();
310        if (blockCount > 0) {
311            Size2D[] sizes = new Size2D[blocks.size()];
312            for (int i = 0; i < blocks.size(); i++) {
313                Block block = blocks.get(i);
314                sizes[i] = block.arrange(g2, RectangleConstraint.NONE);
315                height = height + sizes[i].getHeight();
316                maxWidth = Math.max(sizes[i].width, maxWidth);
317                block.setBounds(
318                    new Rectangle2D.Double(
319                        0.0, y, sizes[i].width, sizes[i].height
320                    )
321                );
322                y = y + sizes[i].height + this.verticalGap;
323            }
324            if (blockCount > 1) {
325                height = height + this.verticalGap * (blockCount - 1);
326            }
327            if (this.horizontalAlignment != HorizontalAlignment.LEFT) {
328                for (int i = 0; i < blocks.size(); i++) {
329                    //Block b = (Block) blocks.get(i);
330                    if (this.horizontalAlignment
331                            == HorizontalAlignment.CENTER) {
332                        //TODO: shift block right by half
333                    }
334                    else if (this.horizontalAlignment
335                            == HorizontalAlignment.RIGHT) {
336                        //TODO: shift block over to right
337                    }
338                }
339            }
340        }
341        return new Size2D(maxWidth, height);
342    }
343
344    /**
345     * Clears any cached information.
346     */
347    @Override
348    public void clear() {
349        // no action required.
350    }
351
352    /**
353     * Tests this instance for equality with an arbitrary object.
354     *
355     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
356     *
357     * @return A boolean.
358     */
359    @Override
360    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
361        if (obj == this) {
362            return true;
363        }
364        if (!(obj instanceof ColumnArrangement)) {
365            return false;
366        }
367        ColumnArrangement that = (ColumnArrangement) obj;
368        if (this.horizontalAlignment != that.horizontalAlignment) {
369            return false;
370        }
371        if (this.verticalAlignment != that.verticalAlignment) {
372            return false;
373        }
374        if (this.horizontalGap != that.horizontalGap) {
375            return false;
376        }
377        if (this.verticalGap != that.verticalGap) {
378            return false;
379        }
380        return true;
381    }
382
383
384}
